com.cloudera.oryx.common.math

Class VectorMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.common.math.VectorMath

  • public final class VectorMath
extends Object
    Utility class with simple vector-related operations.

      • cosineSimilarity

        public static double cosineSimilarity(float[] x,
                                      float[] y,
                                      double normY)
        Computes cosine similarity of values in two given arrays, when the norm of one array is known in advance, which is a not-uncommon case.
        Parameters:
        x - one array
        y - the other array
        normY - norm of y
        Returns:
        cosine similarity = dot(x,y) / (norm(x) * norm(y))

      • transposeTimesSelf

        public static double[] transposeTimesSelf(Collection<float[]> M)
        Parameters:
        M - tall, skinny matrix
        Returns:
        MT * M as a dense lower-triangular matrix, represented in packed row-major form.

      • parseVector

        public static double[] parseVector(String[] values)
        Parameters:
        values - numeric values as Strings
        Returns:
        values parsed as double[]

      • randomVectorF

        public static float[] randomVectorF(int features,
                                    org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator random)
        Parameters:
        features - dimension of vector
        random - random number generator
        Returns:
        vector whose direction from the origin is chosen uniformly at random, but which is not normalized
